simplified: 老鼠拖木锨，大头在后头

pronunciation.pinyin: lǎo shǔ tuō mù xiān , dà tóu zài hòu tou
pronunciation.wade_giles_pinyin: lao3 shu3 tuo1 mu4 xian1 , da4 tou2 zai4 hou4 tou5

details.simplified: 老鼠拖木锨，大头在后头
details.traditional: 老鼠拖木鍁，大頭在後頭

meanings.value: when the mice drag a shovel, the biggest thing comes second
